original_title: SriLankan Airlines Expands Fleet with Wet-Leased A330
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); SriLankan Airlines announced the addition of a new Airbus A330-200 aircraft to its fleet through a wet lease agreement with Air Belgium.
The aircraft, configured with 22 Business Class and 240 Economy Class seats, will commence operations on key routes to Europe and Asia starting December 29th, 2023.
The leased A330-200 will bolster SriLankan Airlines' capacity and network connectivity, specifically targeting the popular routes of Frankfurt, Dhaka, and Dubai.
